caption.title: Probabilities of glycosylation per site, with non-zero probabilities plotted on log-scale to increase contrast in values.
caption.p: These values are plotted on the functional selection-expected value plot for HA residues on ( A) a linear scale, and on ( B) a log-scale. The probabilities of glycosylation were computed using DMS data and assuming independence of sites (see Materials and methods).
Click here for additional data file.
